Class SpanningTree<V>

java.lang.Object
graph.AbstractUndirectedWeightedGraph<V>
graph.SpanningTree<V>
All Implemented Interfaces:
WeightedGraph<V>
public class SpanningTree<V>
extends AbstractUndirectedWeightedGraph<V>
Implements a tree data structure.

  • Constructor Details

    • SpanningTree

      public SpanningTree​(int max_numb_vertices)
      Creates a new tree data structure
      Parameters:
      max_numb_vertices - Maximum number of vertices tree can have

  • Method Details

    • addEdge

      public boolean addEdge​(V v1, V v2) throws GraphIsCyclicException
      This method connects two vertices and checks if the connection creates a cycle in the tree, if it is created the connection creation is aborted
      Parameters:
      v1 - Vertex 1 to connect
      v2 - Vertex 2 to connect
      Returns:
      true if edge was added, false otherwise
      Throws:
      GraphIsCyclicException - if a cycle is created in the tree

    • setEdgeWeight

      public boolean setEdgeWeight​(V v1, V v2, double weight) throws GraphIsCyclicException
      This method connects two vertices and checks if the connection creates a cycle in the tree, if it is created the connection creation is aborted
      Parameters:
      v1 - Vertex1 to connect
      v2 - Vertex2 to connect
      weight - weight of the edge
      Returns:
      true if edge was added, false otherwise
      Throws:
      GraphIsCyclicException - if a cycle is created in the tree

    • findHeight

      public int findHeight()
      Finds the index of the adjacency matrix that has the shortest height
      Returns:
      the index of the shortest height
